DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the cubic millimeters of volume of pulmonary emphysema detected by imaging study.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Volume value for pulmonary emphysema detected through medical imaging.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Relating to the lungs.:A subcategory of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).  It occurs in people who smoke and suffer from chronic bronchitis.  It is characterized by inflation of the alveoli, alveolar wall damage, and reduction in the number of alveoli, resulting in difficulty breathing.  Alveoli are the vital lung structures where the transfer of oxygen and carbon dioxide takes place. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: Relating to the lungs as the intended site of administration, where the pharmaceutical product is administered, usually by inhalation, for local action in the lower respiratory tract or for systemic action after absorption via the lower respiratory tract.

A subcategory of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). It occurs in people who smoke and suffer from chronic bronchitis. It is characterized by inflation of the alveoli, alveolar wall damage, and reduction in the number of alveoli, resulting in difficulty breathing.

Property.preferredDefinition: The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container.

Concepts.definition: The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent a volume in cubic millimeters.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A unit of measure equaling one thousandth of a meter. (NCI):Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A metric unit of length equal to one thousandth of a meter (10E-3 meter) or approximately 0.03937 inch.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
